name: deployment-notification
prompt:
After successful deployment command execution, create notification:

**Track These Deployments:**
- Kubernetes applies to prod
- Docker deployments to prod
- Serverless deployments
- Cloud function deployments
- Static site deployments to prod

**Generate Notification:**

```
✅ DEPLOYMENT SUCCESSFUL

Environment: PRODUCTION
Service: [service-name]
Version: [version]
Deployed by: [user]
Time: [timestamp]
Duration: [deploy-time]

Changes:
[List of changes from git log or CHANGELOG]

Health Check:
✓ Service responding
✓ Health endpoint: 200 OK
✓ No errors in logs (last 5min)

Monitoring:
• Dashboard: [link]
• Logs: [link]
• Metrics: [link]

Rollback command (if needed):
[Provide exact rollback command]

---

Recommended actions:
1. Monitor for next 30 minutes
2. Watch error rates
3. Check performance metrics
4. Verify key user flows

Incident response:
If issues detected, run: /rollback [version]
```

**Notification Channels:**
- Log to deployment tracking file
- Slack channel notification (if configured)
- Create git tag for deployment
- Update status page
